title: E210 The Golden Plunger Award and the London Fog Cult
description:
Let's plunge into it! Episode 210 celebrates all things lemon and plunger related as we also spill bread crumbs all over the floor... That's because Em is taking us on a very timely journey through the wild web of beliefs of the QAnon conspiracy theory. Then we segoo flawlessly into cult territory as Christine takes us to Antelope, Oregon in the 80s to cover the Rajneesh Movement and their plan to poison an entire town. We also learn how Christine finally made the cut for Hoboken Style, baby! ...and that's why we drink!

Here are some real sites you can visit for more info on the fight against human trafficking:

freedomunited.org
humantraffickingcenter.org
assetcampaign.org
The National Human Trafficking Hotline: 1.888.373.7888

Please consider supporting the companies that support us!

Right now, you can go to HuntAKiller.com/DRINK and use DRINK, for 20% off your first box!

Go to DailyHarvest.com and enter promo code DRINK to get $25 off your first
box!

Make the switch to Native TODAY by going to NativeDeo.com/DRINK, or use promo code drink at checkout, and get 25% off your first order!
